name: Awork App, Inc.
description: Developer of a job-search mobile application designed to connect job seekers with organizations. The company's platform helps firms to digitally manage the recruitment process and uses mechanics that allow job-seekers to quickly go through the job postings and submit resumes within a single swipe, enabling users to search for jobs in their vicinity and corporations to recruit talents.
one_liner: Developer of a job-search mobile application designed to connect job seekers with organizations. The company's platform helps firms to digitally manage the recruitment process and uses mechanics that allow job-seekers to quickly go through the job postings and submit resumes within a single swipe, enabling users to search for jobs in their vicinity and corporations to recruit talents.
